cards.title: Breach Mage
setup: Put two "Stable Breach" into play with no tokens in their Focus Pools.
Put two "Potent Breach" into play with 3 and 4 tokens in their Focus Pools.
gameplay: At the start of your turn, you may activate the [u]Cast[/u] effects of each of your Spells and destroy those spells.
powers: Destroy 2 of your Charge cards. If you do, select a card and activate its [u]Cast[/u] text twice, then destroy that card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
